# 2020-05-26: Wrapping up our discussion on how to manage and use data

<https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/ds-incubator/issues/46>

This meetup wrapped up our discussion about how to improve the way we manage and use data. We covered:

* The definition of "cache".
* Revisit [the flow of data](https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/ds-incubator/the-flow-of-data.html).
* Compare Dropbox versus Azure+pins
* Discussed commends and questions
